series.title: Your Lie in April
series.desc: A piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his childhood is forced back into the spotlight by an eccentric girl with a secret of her own.

episodes.title: 1. Monotone/Colorful
episodes.desc: A former piano prodigy is about to discover that a seemingly small event can drastically alter the direction of a person's life.

episodes.title: 2. Friend A
episodes.desc: Kousei gets tricked into going to a performance by his close childhood friend and in that performance he starts to regain a shred of his passion.

episodes.title: 3. Inside Spring
episodes.desc: Kousei's friends work together to try to convince him to accompany Kaori at her next recital.

episodes.title: 4. Departure
episodes.desc: Kousai being Kaori's accompanist appears to be a bad idea.

episodes.title: 5. Gray Skies
episodes.desc: Kaori is hospitalized after the competition. Kousei thinks deeply that playing the piano is the only way he can live. Tsubaki gets asked out by her senior she had admired before.

series.title: Stranger Things
series.desc: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

episodes.title: 1. Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
episodes.desc: At the U.S. Dept. of Energy an unexplained event occurs. Then when a young Dungeons and Dragons playing boy named Will disappears after a night with his friends, his mother Joyce and the town of Hawkins are plunged into darkness.

episodes.title: 2. Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
episodes.desc: Mike hides the mysterious girl in his house. Joyce gets a strange phone call.

episodes.title: 3. Chapter Three: Holly, Jolly
episodes.desc: An increasingly concerned Nancy looks for Barb and finds out what Jonathan's been up to. Joyce is convinced Will is trying to talk to her.

episodes.title: 4. Chapter Four: The Body
episodes.desc: Refusing to believe Will is dead, Joyce tries to connect with her son. The boys give Eleven a makeover. Jonathan and Nancy form an unlikely alliance.

episodes.title: 5. Chapter Five: The Flea and the Acrobat
episodes.desc: Hopper breaks into the lab to find the truth about Will's death. The boys try to locate the "gate" that will take them to Will.

series.title: Supernatural
series.desc: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons and gods that roam the earth.

episodes.title: 1. Pilot
episodes.desc: Sam and Dean Winchester were trained by their father to hunt the creatures of the supernatural. Now, their father has mysteriously disappeared while hunting the demon that killed their mother, 22 years ago.

episodes.title: 2. Wendigo
episodes.desc: Sam and Dean make a stop at Blackwater Ridge and end up helping a young woman and her brother find their other brother, who mysteriously disappeared, while on a camping trip, in the woods.

episodes.title: 3. Dead in the Water
episodes.desc: Something, in the lake of a small town, is killing innocent people.

episodes.title: 4. Phantom Traveler
episodes.desc: A friend of John's calls Sam and Dean for help about a strange recording on the black box of a crashed plane. They soon realize that the demon which caused the crash is picking off the crash's only seven survivors.

episodes.title: 5. Bloody Mary
episodes.desc: A game of Bloody Mary unleashes a ghost who lives in mirrors and kills by gouging out the eyes of her prey, Sam and Dean must find a way to stop her before she claims another victim.

series.title: Steven Universe
series.desc: A team of intergalactic warriors fights to protect the universe, but the combination of three highly trained beings and one quirky young boy leaves the team struggling to overcome the dangerous scenarios that are put in front of them.

episodes.title: 1. Pilot (The Time Thing)
episodes.desc: Steven gets a hold of a magical time travel hourglass and does what any kid would do - he uses it for comebacks. But toying with magic draws trouble to his sleepy beach town and Steven has to step up and save the day - with more comebacks.

episodes.title: 2. Gem Glow
episodes.desc: Steven thinks his favorite ice cream sandwiches are the trick to summoning his magic shield but learns otherwise when facing off with an acid spewing insect monster.

episodes.title: 3. Laser Light Cannon
episodes.desc: Steven and his father, Greg, search for a light canon that is the only thing that can stop an extraterrestrial object from destroying Beach City.

episodes.title: 4. Cheeseburger Backpack
episodes.desc: Steven takes his newest backpack along on a mission to save a Gem sanctuary.

episodes.title: 5. Together Breakfast
episodes.desc: Steven makes the perfect breakfast, and is determined to share it with the gems.

series.title: The 100
series.desc: Set ninety-seven years after a nuclear war has destroyed civilization, when a spaceship housing humanity's lone survivors sends one hundred juvenile delinquents back to Earth, in hopes of possibly re-populating the planet.

episodes.title: 1. Pilot
episodes.desc: 97 years after a nuclear war, human kind is living in space. 100 juvenile delinquents are sent down to Earth to see if the planet is habitable.

episodes.title: 2. Earth Skills
episodes.desc: Discovering that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Finn, Wells and Murphy head out to find him. On the Ark, Abby is determined to prove Earth is habitable, and enlists a mechanic to craft an escape pod.

episodes.title: 3. Earth Kills
episodes.desc: As a dangerous, acidic fog approaches, Clarke, Finn and Wells set out in search of a seaweed-like plant to make an antibiotic poultice for Jasper's wounds, while a vulnerable young girl follows when Bellamy takes a group out hunting for food.

episodes.title: 4. Murphy's Law
episodes.desc: Bellamy, Clarke and Finn try to protect Charlotte when everyone learns she killed Wells. On the Ark, Abby risks getting floated in order to give Raven the chance to launch the escape pod.

episodes.title: 5. Twilight's Last Gleaming
episodes.desc: A plan to contact the Ark is put in motion after Raven crash lands on Earth. Meanwhile, Abby exposes Kane's plan to reduce the population of the Ark.

series.title: The Walking Dead
series.desc: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

episodes.title: 1. Days Gone Bye
episodes.desc: Deputy Sheriff Rick Grimes awakens from a coma, and searches for his family in a world ravaged by the undead.

episodes.title: 2. Guts
episodes.desc: In Atlanta, Rick is rescued by a group of survivors, but they soon find themselves trapped inside a department store surrounded by walkers.

episodes.title: 3. Tell It to the Frogs
episodes.desc: Rick is reunited with Lori and Carl but soon decides - along with some of the other survivors - to return to the rooftop and rescue Merle. Meanwhile, tensions run high between the other survivors at the camp.

episodes.title: 4. Vatos
episodes.desc: Rick, Glenn, Daryl and T-Dog come across a group of seemingly hostile survivors whilst searching for Merle. Back at camp, Jim begins behaving erratically.

episodes.title: 5. Wildfire
episodes.desc: After the attack on the camp, Rick leads the survivors to the C.D.C., in the hope that they can cure an infected Jim.

series.title: The Umbrella Academy
series.desc: A family of former child heroes, now grown apart, must reunite to continue to protect the world.

episodes.title: 1. We Only See Each Other at Weddings and Funerals
episodes.desc: Years after they rose to fame as young crime-fighting superheroes, the estranged Hargreeves siblings come together to mark their father's death.

episodes.title: 2. Run Boy Run
episodes.desc: After sharing the story of his time travel with Vanya, Five hunts for the owner of a fake eye. But two mysterious assassins are hot on his trail.

episodes.title: 3. Extra Ordinary
episodes.desc: Worried their mother is hiding something, Luther and Allison call a family meeting. Cha-Cha and Hazel catch a big break in their hunt for Five.

episodes.title: 4. Man on the Moon
episodes.desc: The story of Luther's transformation emerges. At the motel, Klaus puts Hazel and Cha-Cha's training to the test. Allison grows suspicious of Leonard.

episodes.title: 5. Number Five
episodes.desc: Five lets Luther in on his secret, Klaus returns from a harrowing trip through time, and Vanya begins to feel different without her meds.

movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.desc: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

content.title: Big Hero 6
content.desc: The special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada. They team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

content.title: Big Hero 6
content.desc: The special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada. They team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

content.title: Big Hero 6
content.desc: The special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada. They team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

content.title: Big Hero 6
content.desc: The special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada. They team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

content.title: Big Hero 6
content.desc: The special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada. They team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

movies.title: Big Hero 6
movies.desc: The special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada. They team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

movies.title: Coraline
movies.desc: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

movies.title: Hamilton
movies.desc: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

movies.title: Gone Girl
movies.desc: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
movies.desc: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

movies.title: Into the Woods
movies.desc: A witch tasks a childless baker and his wife with procuring magical items from classic fairy tales to reverse the curse put on their family tree.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.desc: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

movies.title: Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.desc: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: Spider-man: Into the Spider-verse
movies.desc: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

movies.title: Up
movies.desc: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

recommended.title: Adventure Time
recommended.desc: A 12-year-old boy and his best friend, wise 28-year-old dog with magical powers, go on a series of surreal adventures with each other in a remote future.

episodes.title: 1. Slumber Party Panic
episodes.desc: Princess Bumblegum's latest experiment accidentally unleashes an undead horde upon the Candy Kingdom.

episodes.title: 2. Trouble in Lumpy Space
episodes.desc: Jake is bitten by Lumpy Space Princess and begins to transform into a Lumpy being. In order to find a cure, Finn is travels to Lumpy Space.

episodes.title: 3. Prisoners of Love
episodes.desc: After the Ice King kidnaps a large group of princesses, its up to Finn and Jake to free them.

episodes.title: 4. Tree Trunks
episodes.desc: Tree Trunks joins Finn and Jake on an quest, but finds her talents for adventuring leave something to be desired.

episodes.title: 5. The Enchiridion!
episodes.desc: Princess Bubblegum sends Finn on his most challenging quest yet--to recover The Enchiridion, the hero's handbook.

recommended.title: Anne with an E
recommended.desc: The adventures of a young orphan girl living in the late 19th century. Follow Anne as she learns to navigate her new life on Prince Edward Island, in this new take on L.M. Montgomery's classic novels.

episodes.title: 1. Your Will Shall Decide Your Destiny
episodes.desc: Anne arrives at Green Gables and struggles with fitting into her new environment.

episodes.title: 2. I Am No Bird, and No Net Ensnares Me
episodes.desc: Filled with worry Matthew Cuthbert races to find Anne before it's too late.

episodes.title: 3. But What Is So Headstrong as Youth?
episodes.desc: Anne is introduced to the inner social workings of public school, while Marilla is introduced to the inner social workings of Avonlea's progressive young mothers.

episodes.title: 4. An Inward Treasure Born
episodes.desc: Anne and Marilla struggle with Anne's staunch boycott of the local school. A minister's backward advice has a reverse effect, causing Anne to fiercely challenge gender norms.

episodes.title: 5. Tightly Knotted to a Similar String
episodes.desc: Anne is allowed to ask her best friend Diana over for afternoon tea, things start to go wrong when she looks for the Raspberry Cordial.

recommended.title: Bob's Burgers
recommended.desc: Bob Belcher, along with his wife and 3 children, try to run their last hope of holding the family together, which is running Bob's dream restaurant.

episodes.title: 1. Human Flesh
episodes.desc: On top of watching his dysfunctional family crumble around him, Bob faces the wrath of a jealous health inspector who cooks up a nasty rumor about the restaurant's choice of meat.

episodes.title: 2. Crawl Space
episodes.desc: His in-law's are coming into town, and Bob tries desperately to concoct a plan to avoid them for as long as he can. Unfortunately, Bob did not plan to get stuck in the recesses of the family restaurant.

episodes.title: 3. Sacred Cow
episodes.desc: A filmmaker placed a cow outside the restaurant to make a statement, which angers Bob, but his family is confused over how he treats the cow.

episodes.title: 4. Sexy Dance Fighting
episodes.desc: Tina is going through the heartbreak of puberty; once they see it is not contagious, Gene and Louise try to cheer up their big sister. They show her what they believe is a smelly special needs breakdancing class in Brazilian. Tina's hormones are fueled by lithe, muscular Jairo and his martial art, Capoeira.

episodes.title: 5. Hamburger Dinner Theater
episodes.desc: Linda is dying to relive her dream of becoming a star on Broadway, so she decides to host a dinner theater at the restaurant. But on opening night a shocking surprise leaves Linda with a more chilling production than she planned for.

recommended.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
recommended.desc: "Brooklyn Nine-Nine" follows the exploits of hilarious Det. Jake Peralta and his diverse, lovable colleagues as they police the NYPD's 99th Precinct.

episodes.title: 1. Pilot
episodes.desc: Detective Jake Peralta finds his work scrutinized when new Captain, Ray Holt, takes over at his precinct.

episodes.title: 2. The Tagger
episodes.desc: When Jake arrives late for work, Captain Holt decides to shadow him. However, the arrest they make proves complicated. Meanwhile, a psychic friend of Gina's gets inside Charles' head.

episodes.title: 3. The Slump
episodes.desc: With a backlog of unsolved cases, Jake finds himself in a slump. Meanwhile, Amy is put in charge of the Junior Police Program for at risk kids, but her efforts to inspire them fall flat.

episodes.title: 4. M.E. Time
episodes.desc: Jake meets an attractive Medical Examiner, but their relationship slows down her work, much to his colleagues' annoyance. Meanwhile, Amy desperately tries to impress Holt.

episodes.title: 5. The Vulture
episodes.desc: A detective from Major Crimes takes over Jake's nearly solved murder case and steals his thunder.

recommended.title: Doctor Who
recommended.desc: The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and their companions from planet Earth.

episodes.title: 1. The Eleventh Hour
episodes.desc: With his TARDIS in ruins, the newly-regenerated Doctor with the help of Amy Pond must save the world in less than twenty minutes from galactic policemen known as the Atraxi.

episodes.title: 2. The Beast Below
episodes.desc: The Doctor takes Amy to the future inside Starship UK, which contains in addition to British explorers, an intimidating race known as the Smilers.

episodes.title: 3. Victory of the Daleks
episodes.desc: The TARDIS takes The Doctor and Amy to war-torn Britain in the middle of World War Two. Not only do they meet Winston Churchill himself, but the Doctor comes face to face once again with his greatest enemy of all.

episodes.title: 4. The Time of Angels
episodes.desc: The Doctor and Amy emerge from the TARDIS to find the wreck of the Byzantium spaceship. Down below the Weeping Angels are stirring, but the Doctor has someone else to contend with; none other than the mysterious Professor River Song.

episodes.title: 5. Flesh and Stone
episodes.desc: The Doctor, Amy, Dr. Song and the remaining soldiers manage to escape from the crashed ship and into the forest. The Angels attempt to create a rift in time and space much as the Doctor had found in Amy's room when they first met.

recommended.title: Game of Thrones
recommended.desc: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

episodes.title: 1. Winter Is Coming
episodes.desc: Eddard Stark is torn between his family and an old friend when asked to serve at the side of King Robert Baratheon; Viserys plans to wed his sister to a nomadic warlord in exchange for an army.

episodes.title: 2. The Kingsroad
episodes.desc: While Bran recovers from his fall, Ned takes only his daughters to King's Landing. Jon Snow goes with his uncle Benjen to the Wall. Tyrion joins them.

episodes.title: 3. Lord Snow
episodes.desc: Jon begins his training with the Night's Watch; Ned confronts his past and future at King's Landing; Daenerys finds herself at odds with Viserys.

episodes.title: 4. Cripples, Bastards, and Broken Things
episodes.desc: Eddard investigates Jon Arryn's murder. Jon befriends Samwell Tarly, a coward who has come to join the Night's Watch.

episodes.title: 5. The Wolf and the Lion
episodes.desc: Catelyn has captured Tyrion and plans to bring him to her sister, Lysa Arryn, at the Vale, to be tried for his, supposed, crimes against Bran. Robert plans to have Daenerys killed, but Eddard refuses to be a part of it and quits.

recommended.title: Gravity Falls
recommended.desc: Twin siblings Dipper and Mabel Pines spend the summer at their great-uncle's tourist trap in the enigmatic Gravity Falls, Oregon.

episodes.title: 1. Tourist Trapped
episodes.desc: After finding a strange book in the forest, Dipper begins to learn about the dark side of Gravity Falls, and suspects that Mabel's new boyfriend is a zombie.

episodes.title: 2. The Legend of the Gobblewonker
episodes.desc: Stan takes the kids fishing for the day, but they ditch him to search for a lake monster called the Gobblewonker in order to win a photo contest.

episodes.title: 3. Headhunters
episodes.desc: The kids discover Stan's collection of wax sculptures, and Mabel decides to create her own. But when someone sabotages it, it's up to her and Dipper to solve the case.

episodes.title: 4. The Hand That Rocks the Mabel
episodes.desc: Dipper and Mabel go to see Stan's arch nemesis, a psychic by the name of Lil' Gideon, who becomes obsessed with Mabel.

episodes.title: 5. The Inconveniencing
episodes.desc: Dipper tries to impress Wendy by going along with her and her friends to an abandoned convenience store that may be haunted.

recommended.title: Parks and Recreation
recommended.desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

episodes.title: 1. Pilot
episodes.desc: In an attempt to beautify her town, Leslie Knope takes on the seemingly simple job of helping turn an abandoned construction pit into a park.

episodes.title: 2. Canvassing
episodes.desc: Leslie gets a town hall meeting to discuss her park idea, but she finds out that public reception is less than receptive.

episodes.title: 3. The Reporter
episodes.desc: Leslie gets a newspaper reporter to do a story about her and the park idea, but becomes upset when she finds out that the reporter slept with Mark.

episodes.title: 4. Boys' Club
episodes.desc: Leslie tries to infiltrate the boys' club of politics by crashing an after-work gathering at the town hall. Trying to fit in, she opens a gift basket breaking the local government ethics, and then is called before an ethics committee.

episodes.title: 5. The Cones of Dunshire
episodes.desc: Chris mediates one final skirmish between Leslie and councilman Jamm, Ben begins a new job as an accountant, and Ron lets Donna and Tom try to sell one of his cabins.
